extendedInfo.description: Download the hclib.org app andCheck My Account â renew items, review holdsSearch our catalog, place requests and discover new and recommended booksFind author talks and other library eventsGet branch locations, hours and directionsGet help via phone, chat or emailConnect to us on social networks like Facebook and Twitter.Please note the CAMERA permission is required to use the BookLook feature to scan a UPC code and look up a book.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work any more
reviews.comment: I have used this app on my galaxy s 2 it was working perfectly no problems, easy to use now I can\'t even put anything on hold I search for something thing click on it to put it on hold put it says title not available which just started happening like 3 days ago before that is was working great.  Hope you can fix it as I do go to the library a lot.

reviews.title: Lacking
reviews.comment: On the plus side, the app is fast, but it gives no I dictation of whether a title is available until you click the download button.   It allows you to search if you know what you want, but no way to browse within a subject area.  At this point, just stick with  the Overdrive app.

reviews.title: Great, if only we could see our lists!
reviews.comment: In general, if you live in Hennepin county and you love books, this is a must have app.  It\'s the fastest way to search the catalog, and having your holds, and books out is very helpful.  The barcode scanner is neat, but of limited value for books that have had multiple printings.  The feature I want the most is the ability to see, add and modify items on My List.  And, as others have said, being able to save your PIN in the app would be nice, but the app saves your ID, so it\'s just 4 digits to deal with.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute garbage.
reviews.comment: The app apparently broke for everyone and the creators never bothered to tell us. Because of that, I had $22.35 in late fees and the app never told me. Avoid this app.

reviews.title: If app is not working.
reviews.comment: Open the app,from options button. Select open in browser. Enter account details. Donot signout when finished. Just open again when needed.
